reviewText: If you get this tape, the first thing you'll notice is that these women are not found on your average exercise video.  That's what I like about it.  The aerobics part is excellent.  If you have a bad back like I do, you'll need to modify.  The floor exercises are a lot more than I can do, but I do think that the aerobic part is useful.  Most of all I admire women like Sharlyne Powell who are willing to show the world it is possible to exercise even when you are heavy.  I can only find two exercise videos with her leading them, and of the two, I think this is the best.
